synonyms.synonym: Protein kinase A-anchoring protein 7 isoform gamma

protein.specific_function: Probably targets cAMP-dependent protein kinase (PKA) to the cellular membrane or cytoskeletal structures

reference.reference_text: Trotter KW, Fraser ID, Scott GK, Stutts MJ, Scott JD, Milgram SL: Alternative splicing regulates the subcellular localization of A-kinase anchoring protein 18 isoforms. J Cell Biol. 1999 Dec 27;147(7):1481-92.
